activity_peak_question: Does this repository hold a special place in your memory?
quote_10: Every great project starts with a single line of code. Keep exploring!
quote_20: You're finding your rhythm. Every commit is a step forward in your journey.
quote_50: Consistency builds mastery. You're planting seeds for the future.
quote_100: Your code is taking shape. Keep building, keep learning, keep growing.
quote_200: The world runs on code, and you're part of the engine. Keep pushing boundaries.
quote_500: Creativity meets logic. You're turning ideas into reality, one commit at a time.
quote_1000: Passion fuels progress. Your dedication to the craft is inspiring.
quote_max: The limit is your imagination. Continue to innovate and shape the digital world.
settings_show_green_wall_desc: Show GitHub contribution calendar on the intro slide.
settings_language_count_desc: Number of languages to show in badges and pie chart.
settings_repo_count_desc: Number of top repositories to display.
settings_oss_count_desc: Number of open source contributions to display.
home_no_report_desc: Enter your GitHub Personal Access Token to generate your annual coding report. Your token is never stored on our servers.
home_oss_include_own: Include Own Repositories in OSS Stats
home_token_help: Token requires read:user scope. It is not stored on server.
home_oss_min_stars_help: Minimum stars for a repo to count as "Open Source" contribution.
home_banner_suffix: and clone it to let your AI agent modify it for you!
home_banner_intro: Remember to check out Story Mode above!
home_banner_desc: Want more diverse data or custom slide cards? Star our repository
